properties.areaDesc: Coastal Waters from Stake Island LA to Southwest Pass of the Mississippi River from 20 to 60 nm; Coastal waters from Pascagoula Mississippi to Stake Island Louisiana out 20 to 60 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 31 at 3:06PM CST until February 2 at 9:00AM CST by NWS New Orleans LA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Northwest winds 20 to 25 kt with gusts up to 30 kt and
seas 6 to 9 ft expected.

* WHERE...All of the open Gulf waters.

* WHEN...From noon Saturday to 9 AM CST Sunday.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A Small Craft Advisory means that wind
speeds of 20 to 33 knots are expected to produce hazardous wave
conditions to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON SATURDAY TO 9 AM CST SUNDAY
